quote: Thus ended the first and adventurous part of his existence. What followed was so different that, but for the reality of sorrow which remained with him, this strange part must have resembled a dream.
quote_letters: THUS ENDED THE FIRST AND ADVENTUROUS PART OF HIS EXISTENCE WHAT FOLLOWED WAS SO DIFFERENT THAT BUT FOR THE REALITY OF SORROW WHICH REMAINED WITH HIM THIS STRANGE PART MUST HAVE RESEMBLED A DREAM
